Package com.opatomic

Interface OpaClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OpaStreamClient
    public interface OpaClient
    Opatomic client interface used to send commands and receive the responses via callbacks. Unless otherwise specified in implementation, the args parameters must not be modified until response callback is invoked. ie, when call()/callA()/callID() returns, the request may not have been serialized completely, meaning the args parameter might be in-use by serialization code.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void call​(CharSequence cmd, Iterator<Object> args, CallbackSF<Object,​OpaRpcError> cb)
      Run specified command on server.
      void callA​(CharSequence cmd, Iterator<Object> args, CallbackSF<Object,​OpaRpcError> cb)
      Run specified command on server with an auto-generated asynchronous id.
      void callID​(Object id, CharSequence cmd, Iterator<Object> args)
      Run specified command on the server with a specified async id.
      CallbackSF<Object,​OpaRpcError> registerCB​(Object id, CallbackSF<Object,​OpaRpcError> cb)
      Register a callback to an async id that can be used by callID().

    • Method Detail

      • call

        void call​(CharSequence cmd,
          Iterator<Object> args,
          CallbackSF<Object,​OpaRpcError> cb)
        Run specified command on server.
        Parameters:
        cmd - Command to run
        args - Command's parameters. Do not modify
        cb - Callback to invoke when response is received. If null then server will not send a response

      • callA

        void callA​(CharSequence cmd,
           Iterator<Object> args,
           CallbackSF<Object,​OpaRpcError> cb)
        Run specified command on server with an auto-generated asynchronous id. Specified callback is invoked once, when response received. Response can arrive out of order. Command must respond only 1 time... do not use this for SUBSCRIBE (use callID() instead).
        Parameters:
        cmd - Command to run
        args - Command's parameters. Do not modify
        cb - Callback to invoke when response is received. Cannot be null.

      • registerCB

        CallbackSF<Object,​OpaRpcError> registerCB​(Object id,
                                                CallbackSF<Object,​OpaRpcError> cb)
        Register a callback to an async id that can be used by callID().
        Parameters:
        id - Async id
        cb - Callback to invoke when each response is received. Use null to remove registered callback
        Returns:
        Previously registered callback for the specified async id.

      • callID

        void callID​(Object id,
            CharSequence cmd,
            Iterator<Object> args)
        Run specified command on the server with a specified async id. Any responses to the command will invoke the callback that was given as a parameter to register().
        Parameters:
        id - Async id
        cmd - Command to run
        args - Command's parameters. Do not modify
